                           Release Notes

Comments :
1938, Romania: at 70, a professor of language and philosophy, Dominic Matei, 
contemplates suicide: the love of his life is dead, and he remains unable to 
complete his life&#039;s work on the origins of language. Then, he&#039;s struck by 
lightning. After a slow recovery, he grows younger. He must now avoid Nazis, 
who want to study and experiment on him. Some years later, he meets a young 
woman who has her own passage through a lightning storm. Not only does 
Dominic find love again, but her new abilities hold the key to his research. 
Is the sweetness of life finally at hand?

Director : Francis Ford Coppola

Writers: Francis Ford Coppola (screenplay)
         Mircea Eliade (novella)
